evidence.claim: Aegis uses AWS for its cloud infrastructure, ensuring scalability and security.
They implement FHIR standards to enhance interoperability between health systems.
HIPAA compliance is integral to Aegis's data management practices.
Aegis Healthcare has integrations with various EHR systems to streamline workflows.

icp.icp_reason: Aegis Healthcare shows clear engagement with X12 and EDI transactions relevant for healthcare data exchange.
